text: Hi! I have a quick question. Is it recommended to include images in my proposal to illustrate my past projects, in Julia and otherwise?

elements.text: Hi! I have a quick question. Is it recommended to include images in my proposal to illustrate my past projects, in Julia and otherwise?

text: There are no recommendations regarding images, at least that I'm aware of, but if it helps to better illustrate the proposal go for it. I had a couple of images in mine if I remember correctly

text: No problem! If you want some feedback once you're done with the proposal send it to the channel. That way you could get more specific pointers, if needed
